App Name: Popsa

Brief

Popsa is your go-to mobile solution for creating personalized photo products with ease. Whether you're looking to craft a sleek photobook, a custom calendar, or simply print your cherished memories, Popsa automates the process, ensuring a smooth and hassle-free experience from selecting photos to the final print.
